name: HKWorkoutSessionDelegate
desc: The session delegate protocol defines an interface for receiving notifications about errors and changes in the workout session’s state.

items.name: func workoutSession(HKWorkoutSession, didChangeTo: HKWorkoutSessionState, from: HKWorkoutSessionState, date: Date)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session’s state has changed.

items.name: func workoutSession(HKWorkoutSession, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session has failed with an error.

items.name: func workoutSession(HKWorkoutSession, didGenerate: HKWorkoutEvent)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the system has generated a workout event.
